tallison@mitre.org
text:
Ravindra,
  Thank you for reporting this.  That issue was fixed by at least 3.10-beta2 (http://poi.apache.org/download.html#POI-3.10-beta2).  Give that a try and let us know if that doesn't meet your needs.

creator: hiravi_2410@yahoo.co.in
text:
Hi,

I checked, it is working fine with 3.10-beta2 version.
Thanks for your response.

Thanks

text: Resolving this issue based on previous comment.
